name: Abomination VR
description:
This is a short but sweet local multiplayer VR horror game where one person (In VR) has to escape a maze and a monster played by the other player (On a traditional monitor setup).

Survivor VR Controls:

HTC ViveValve IndexArmswinger LocomotionMenu ButtonB ButtonGrab/InteractGrip ButtonSqueeze Controller

Monster Controls:

  • Left and right arrow keys - Turn the monster left and right down hallways
  • Shift - Make the monster sprint

press escape to quit the game

When the player reaches the end you will have to quit the application before starting another game.
